 2010-12682010-10-21,  ,  ,  ,  HEALTH, 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program), in order to increase the consistency between the English and French language versions of the regulations and ensure greater clarity of application, as recommended by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
